bug.author: calvinjia
bug.summary: Improve ufs journal reader buffer usage
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.1.0-SNAPSHOT Describe the bug We allocate unnecessary buffers when parsing JournalEntries through the UFS journal reader. To Reproduce Switch journal type to UFS and read a journal. Expected behavior We use 1 buffer per Journal reader that expands on demand. Urgency Medium, this can cause us to allocate many more objects which can be problematic if the journal is large.
